name: Inconceivable!
description:
tests your luck gaining between one and six buffs! Buff durations and your luck scale with Pips spent.

Humiliations Galore: Every Pip generator earns an additional Pip 
Bonetti's Defense: Adds 25 In Combat Health Regeneration 
Capo Ferro: Gain a chance to attack twice with Saber Attack and Pistol Shot 
Prepare to Die: Increase damage by 9% 
Agrippa: Increase Critical Strike by 9% 
Thibault: Increase Critical Amount by 19%
